title: Career Opportunities at Chico State – Chico State
body:

			        Chico State
			    MenuShow search box.AboutAcademicsCost & AidAdmissionsStudent LifeAthleticsAlumniGiveApplyVisitRequest InfoCSU, ChicoCurrent page:  Career Opportunities at Chico State
                        
    		Career Opportunities at Chico State
    	Faculty, Staff, & Management Careers
Chico State seeks outstanding candidates committed to student success who reflect the intersectional identities of our Wildcats to fill roles in and out of the classroom.Chico State Enterprises (CSE)CSE is a non-profit auxiliary organization that serves the University’s mission with roles that promote, support, and manage funded research, partnerships, and innovative opportunities.Associated StudentsThe Associated Students is the center of the diverse co-curricular experience at Chico State. Employment opportunities are available for both career-seeking and student applicants throughout the year.Student Jobs and InternshipsMany students earn money and valuable experience by working interning during their college careers. The Career Center offers support services and a job board with positions available throughout the year.What It’s Like in ChicoApply for a position and become a part of our amazing community.Naturally BeautifulNamed one of the greenest schools in the nation in The Princeton Review’s "Guide to Green Colleges," most Wildcats live, learn, and work within walking or biking distance of campus.Strategic InitiativesChico State has intentionally made equity, diversity, and inclusion the University’s top Strategic Plan priority in order to challenge and change the status quo on our campus and in society.Welcoming CommunityOur campus is located right next to charming downtown Chico with dining, retail, and farmers markets that create a welcoming atmosphere.We acknowledge and are mindful that Chico State stands on lands that were originally occupied by the first people of this area, the Mechoopda, and we recognize their distinctive spiritual relationship with this land, the flora, the fauna, and the waters that run through campus.We are humbled that our campus resides upon sacred lands that since time immemorial have sustained the Mechoopda people and continue to do so today.MenuChico State HomeAboutAcademicsAdmissionsCost & AidStudent LifeAcademic DepartmentsAthleticsAlumniParentsChico FactsGiveResourcesQuicklinksCampus CalendarCampus SafetyJob OpportunitiesAccessibility Resource CenterAnnual Security Report (PDF)
We acknowledge and are mindful that Chico State stands on lands that were originally occupied by the first people of this area, Mechoopda, and we recognize their distinctive spiritual relationship with this land, the flora, the fauna, and the waters that run through campus. We are humbled that our campus resides upon sacred lands that since time immemorial have sustained the Mechoopda people and continue to do so today.Contact UsNeed Help?FacebookFacebookTwitterTwitterInstagramInstagramReport an accessibility issueReport a broken link on this pageTitle IXPrivacy PolicyCalifornia State University, Chico400 West First StreetChico, CA 95929Copyright © 2023 All Rights Reserved
